duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for all onsite and remote UC design, implementation, support, and maintenance needs of customers.
Troubleshoot and support desktop and server operating system applications.
Design and implement UC solutions at client locations.
Work with communications service providers for ordering, installing, and troubleshooting of voice and data services.
Design, implement, and support disaster recovery solutions.
Communicate with customers to keep them informed of incident progress and notify them of impending changes or outages.
Maintain customer service perception and satisfaction.
Responsible for entering time and expenses as they occur.
Enter all work as service tickets.
Work through a daily schedule established through the dispatch process.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
